text: @TMobile @Tesla #tmobiletuesday #contest I would take it 250 miles away and turn around and come back, because I am restricted to a 250 mile radius by Air Force guidance due to #COVID19. Once all of this crap is settled down though it would be great to take my son or daughter off to college in.
